attributes.action: Abolish stripping citizens of their British citizenship without a prior warning.
attributes.additional_details: This law that is looking to be passed is wrong and shouldn't even be on the table of stripping citizenship if someone commits a crime you trial and punish on legal system grounds not start stripping everyone citizenship not everyone is the same and nor does everyone deserve to be treated badly just because of a group of bad people. Many migrants from across the world have come to UK contributed to the economy. Please don't pass such a bill it's deprivation of human rights and needs to be stopped!
attributes.background: What is looking to be passed is wrong and unfair as many people come on various grounds to the UK and many work hard to contribute to the UK and provide for there families what looks to be passed is vile and taking away human rights how dare Priti Patel says this is a privilege.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601583
